name: Five Nights at Backrooms: Waifu Edition
name_original: Five Nights at Backrooms: Waifu Edition
description:
Welcome to Backrooms, to a previously unknown level. The Backrooms are inhabited by special entities that look cute, but when you get close to them, they'll do anything to kill you. Their peculiarity is that they move only at night. Yes, on this level Backrooms has a day and night shift. You have found a small office with a generator and are ready to take the fight to them.

From your office, you should keep a close eye on the security cameras. You have a very limited amount of electricity that you can use overnight. This means that when you run out of energy, no more security doors and cameras! As soon as one of the entity left his post, your task will be to find them and, as a last resort, close the doors.

Freatures:
*Tense gameplay. At your disposal are only cameras and doors. All this requires energy, which must be saved;
*Three dolls, each with their own AI. Someone needs to be watched more often, and someone often moves;
*After passing 5 nights, the custom night will become available to you. In it you can customize the game as you want;
*A large number of jumpscares;
